name: Spicy Guacamole with Chipotle
author: Kingston Hannibal
summary: Good spicy-smoky twist to classic guacamole! Simple and easy to make. Great as a dip or on sandwiches, burgers, salads, soups, or just straight up by itself! Enjoy. To watch a video of this recipe, visit my YouTube channel, "Kingston Hannibal."
ingredients: 2  chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, chopped, divided
salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup seeded and diced jalapeno peppers
directions: Cut open avocados and scoop all the flesh into a large bowl
Mash with a bean masher or spoon until there are no large chunks of avocado left
Squeeze lime juice over the avocado
Add cilantro and 1 chipotle pepper with some adobo sauce
Season with salt and pepper; mix to combine
Mix in red onion and jalapenos
Add tomato and mix gently to combine
Chill before serving garnished with remaining chipotle pepper and adobo sauce
